name: RXA_RESPONSE_DUR
description: The Drug Utilization Review (DUR) response section received from the payor.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the adjudication record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: I_REASON_FOR_SVC_ID
columns.description: NCPDP code identifying the type of utilization conflict detected or the reason for the pharmacists professional service.

columns.name: I_REASON_FOR_SVC_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: I_CLIN_SIG_CODE_ID
columns.description: NCPDP code identifying the significance or severity level of a clinical event as contained in the originating database.

columns.name: I_CLIN_SIG_CODE_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: I_PHRM_RESP_DUR_ID
columns.description: NCPDP code indicating the pharmacy responsible for the previous event involved in the DUR conflict.

columns.name: I_PHRM_RESP_DUR_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: I_QTY_PREV_FILL
columns.description: Previously filled amount expressed in metric decimal units

columns.name: I_DRUG_INFO_SRC_ID
columns.description: NCPDP code identifying the source of drug information used for DUR processing or to define the database used for identifying the product.

columns.name: I_DRUG_INFO_SRC_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: I_PRESC_COMP_ID
columns.description: NCPDP code comparing the prescriber of the current prescription to the prescriber of the previously filled conflicting prescription.

columns.name: I_PRESC_COMP_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: I_DUR_ALERT_ADDL_TX
columns.description: Text that provides additional detail regarding a DUR conflict.

columns.name: I_PRSC_PREV_FILL_DT
columns.description: The date the prescription was previously filled.

columns.name: I_DUR_CNFLT_ADDL_TX
columns.description: Descriptive information that further defines the referenced DUR alert.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.
